Job Posting:169193 - Position: F25 Mobile Developer Intern, Magenta (Fall/September 2025, 4-8 Months) 169193 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 05/19/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 05/05/2025 10:53 AM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country Geotab 2440 Winston Park Dr Oakville L6H 7V2 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2025 - Fall F25 Mobile Developer Intern, Magenta (Fall/September 2025, 4-8 Months) 169193 Co-op Position Various, ON Canada 4 or 8 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Job Description Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Who you are: We are always looking for amazing talent who can contribute to our growth and deliver results! Geotab is seeking an Mobile Developer Intern who will develop/test/review android and iOS code that will be deployed to the app stores and used by our customers. If you love technology, and are keen to join an industry leader - we would love to hear from you! What you'll do: As a Mobile Developer Intern, your key area of responsibility will be : • Developing new features and fixing bugs in our mobile products. • Contributing to team meetings so that we continue to get better. • Collaborating with the team on design discussions. • Reviewing the code of your team members. Ensuring a high level of quality in the product through automated and manual testing. • To be successful in this role you will be a self-starter with strong written and verbal communication skills, and have the ability to quickly understand complex, technical concepts. The opportunity • 4 - 8 month work-term beginning September 2025. • Full-time, paid internship: Monday - Friday, 37.5hrs/week. • Your first week at Geotab begins with 'GEO Launch' - a one-week Employee Orientation. Click here to learn more! • Learn more about the Geotab Campus Program here. How you'll make an impact • Developing new features and fixing bugs in our mobile products. • Contributing to team meetings so that we continue to get better. • Collaborating with the team on design discussions. • Reviewing the code of your team members. Ensuring a high level of quality in the product through automated and manual testing. • Job Requirements What you'll bring to the role • Pursuing a Degree/Diploma in Computer Science, Math, Software Engineering or a related field. • Experience developing mobile applications iOS/Android will put you at the top of the list Experience with JAVA/Kotlin or Objective-C/Swift • If you got this far, we hope you're feeling excited about this role! Even if you don't feel you meet every single requirement, we still encourage you to apply. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: Job Application for Mobile Developer Intern, Magenta (Fall/September 2025, 4-8 Months) at Internship List Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
